Class com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage 

Object
   |
   +----com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage
public class HTMLPage
extends Object
The HTMLPage class is used to parse an HTML page and store that page, in a parsed form, in memory. are exchanged with a webserver. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage. Parser
A HTML parser callback used by this class to detect links, images and forms.

_base
The base URL to resolve relative URL's.
_forms
A list of forms on this page.
_http
The underlying HTTP object for this page.
_images
A list of images on this page.
_links
A list of links on this page.

com.heaton.bot.HTMLPage(HTTP)
Construct an HTMLPage object.

addImage(String)
Called internally to add an image to the list.
getForms()
Get a list of all of the forms from this page.
getHTTP()
Get the underlying HTTP object that was sent to the constructor.
getImages()
Get a list of all of the images from this page.
getLinks()
Get a list of all of the links from this page.
getURL()
Get the URL that is represented by this page.
open(String, HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback)
Called to open a page and read it in.
post(HTMLForm)
Called to perform a post for the specified form.
processPage(HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback)
Internal function called to start the parse.

_base 
protected java.lang.String _base
The base URL to resolve relative URL's.

_forms 
protected java.util.Vector _forms
A list of forms on this page.

_http 
protected com.heaton.bot.HTTP _http
The underlying HTTP object for this page.

_images 
protected java.util.Vector _images
A list of images on this page.

_links 
protected java.util.Vector _links
A list of links on this page.

HTMLPage 
public HTMLPage(HTTP http)
Construct an HTMLPage object.

Parameters:
http - The HTTP object(or subclass) to use to download pages.

addImage 
protected void addImage(String img)
Called internally to add an image to the list.

Parameters:
img - The image to add.
getForms 
public java.util.Vector getForms()
Get a list of all of the forms from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
A list of forms.
getHTTP 
public com.heaton.bot.HTTP getHTTP()
Get the underlying HTTP object that was sent to the constructor.

Returns:
The underlying HTTP object.
getImages 
public java.util.Vector getImages()
Get a list of all of the images from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
A list of all of the images on this page.
getLinks 
public java.util.Vector getLinks()
Get a list of all of the links from this page. If this is to be used then null must have been passed as the callback object to the open method.

Returns:
All links on this page.
getURL 
public java.lang.String getURL()
Get the URL that is represented by this page.

Returns:
The URL that is represented by this page.
open 
public void open(String url,
                 javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback callback) throws IOException, BadLocationException
Called to open a page and read it in. If null is specified for the callback, then the other methods in this class may be used to look at images, links and forms.

Parameters:
url - The URL to read.
callback - A callback class to handle the parse, or null to use the built in one.
Throws: IOException
Throws: BadLocationException
post 
public void post(HTMLForm form) throws IOException
Called to perform a post for the specified form.

Parameters:
form - The form object to post.
Throws: IOException
processPage 
protected void processPage(javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback callback) throws IOException
Internal function called to start the parse.

Parameters:
callback - The callback object to use.
Throws: IOException
